item.title: Physical Sovereignty Crisis: Back Pain Flare & Response
item.description:
Summary: Acute back pain flare: care-provider recon showed systemic delays. Decision: book future specialist slot, deploy immediate countermeasures, pivot to root cause via mattress procurement.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 2

Response Layers

  1. Immediate: Diclofenac gel + heating patches (holding actions)
  2. Near-term: Booked specialist slot (Jan 21)
  3. Root cause: Mattress selected (Dibapur RH5 — pending budget after car)

Status

Mattress researched and selected with Council help, but not ordered yet. Everything comes after the new car next month.

item.title: TEST 003: Mattress Procurement (Dibapur RH5 RG40 H5)
item.description:
Summary: Council-led recon procured Dibapur RH5 cold-foam mattress. Validated data-driven procurement and the ‘medium-firm 6–7/10’ criterion; managed return-logistics risk.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batches 1–2

Selection

  • Product: Dibapur RH5 Cold Foam Mattress (90x200cm)
  • Specs: RG40 density, H5 (Extra Firm) for 95kg user
  • Cost: €177.59
  • Criterion: Medium-firm to firm feel (6-7/10) with verified high-density foam (≥40 kg/m³)

Status

Selected, not yet ordered. Pending budget allocation after car acquisition next month.

Lesson

Budget constraints are engineering parameters, not obstacles. Solutions get engineered inside the constraint.
